name: Defender Gunlance I
description: A gunlance crafted especially to fight off calamity. Modified so that anybody can use it.

name: Champion Gunlance II
description: A fortified gunlance designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Champion Gunlance III
description: A fortified gunlance designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Guardian Gunlance
description: Used by village defenders, this gunlance fortifies one's power to protect like castle walls.

name: Kamura Gunlance II
description: Made in Kamura Village, this gunlance is famous for its elegant and refined design.

name: Kamura Gunlance III
description: Made in Kamura Village, this gunlance is famous for its elegant and refined design.

name: Kamura Gunlance IV
description: Made in Kamura Village, this gunlance is famous for its elegant and refined design.

name: Champion Gunlance
description: A fortified gunlance designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Kamura Gunlance V
description: Made in Kamura Village, this gunlance is famous for its elegant and refined design.

name: Kamura Warrior Gunlance
description: A high-quality gunlance from Kamura Village. Crafted to ensure extreme accuracy.

name: Kamura Ninja Gunlance
description: A high-quality gunlance from Kamura Village. Crafted to ensure extreme accuracy.

name: Duke's Bayonet
description: A glittering metal Malzeno gunlance, with the power to raze castle crenellations.

name: Scorched Schleien
description: All targets bathed in the fire spat from this barrel scream out and burn to ash.

name: Ukiyo no Yamiwo I
description: A resplendent gunlance. Once owned by a samurai, it twinkles in the moonlight.

name: Ukiyo no Yamiwo II
description: A resplendent gunlance. Once owned by a samurai, it twinkles in the moonlight.

name: Fine Kamura Gunlance
description: The best homegrown gunlance with firepower matching its user's experience perfectly.

name: Mizumori
description: The Ukiyo no Yamiwo's upgraded form shimmers morosely within the mist.

name: Harae no Toboshi
description: Fend off rampant gods. Let tranquility reign. O' crimson beacon, never die.

name: Harae no Toboshi+
description: Fend off rampant gods. Let tranquility reign. O' crimson beacon, never die.

name: Kamura Warrior Gunlance+
description: A high-quality gunlance from Kamura Village. Crafted to ensure extreme accuracy.

name: Princess Panoply I
description: A gunlance covered in the Queen's green scales. It fires poisonous shots.

name: Princess Panoply II
description: A gunlance covered in the Queen's green scales. It fires poisonous shots.

name: Ortlinde
description: A Princess Panoply upgrade that turns battlefields into gardens of death.

name: Mizumori+
description: The Ukiyo no Yamiwo's upgraded form shimmers morosely within the mist.

name: Ortlinde+
description: A Princess Panoply upgrade that turns battlefields into gardens of death.

name: Great Ortlinde
description: The damned writhe in toxic seizure, with emerald-green flames their final tribute.

name: Rosenkanone
description: Espinas gunlance. Its fiery "roar" blows away anything that defiles its territory.

name: Great Ortlinde+
description: The damned writhe in toxic seizure, with emerald-green flames their final tribute.

name: Rosenkanone+
description: Espinas gunlance. Its fiery "roar" blows away anything that defiles its territory.

name: Rosenherrlich
description: Upgraded to endure powerful bombardment, its “howl” razing all who invade its territory.

name: Crimson Rook
description: This Red Rook upgrade spews fire hot enough to truly make hell on earth.

name: Red Rook II
description: A gunlance embodying a Rathalos. It sends foes to the grave with a fiery roar.

name: Red Rook I
description: A gunlance embodying a Rathalos. It sends foes to the grave with a fiery roar.

name: Crimson Rook+
description: This Red Rook upgrade spews fire hot enough to truly make hell on earth.

name: Etince Chariot
description: The red scales of this Rathalos armor embody the pride of indestructible sovereignty.

name: Delex Harpoon I
description: A gunlance with a barbed design that can get under even the hardest of scales.

name: Delex Harpoon II
description: A gunlance with a barbed design that can get under even the hardest of scales.

name: Sand Blaster Gunlance
description: This tempered gunlance can rend prey as easily as if they were made of sand.

name: Sand Blaster Gunlance+
description: This tempered gunlance can rend prey as easily as if they were made of sand.

name: Usurper's Roar I
description: A gunlance with the power of a monarch. Its mighty roar heralds the world conqueror.

name: Sandspear
description: Choice materials allow this harpoon to cut through the air like a Delex in sand.

name: Despot's Phlogiston
description: An upgrade of the Usurper's Roar. Conquered empires kneel before its power.

name: Despot's Phlogiston+
description: An upgrade of the Usurper's Roar. Conquered empires kneel before its power.

name: Oppressor's Skyfall
description: Housing the spirit of a mighty champion, the thunder of this spear can bring peace to the land.

name: Usurper's Roar II
description: A gunlance with the power of a monarch. Its mighty roar heralds the world conqueror.

name: Twinfang I
description: A gunlance made from the two icy fangs of a Barioth. Blasts prey like a blizzard.

name: Twinfang II
description: A gunlance made from the two icy fangs of a Barioth. Blasts prey like a blizzard.

name: Ambermarch

name: Amberift
description: An Ambermarch upgrade. This gunlance tears through prey, turning the icy tundra red.

name: Iron Gunlance II

name: Iron Gunlance I

description: A state-of-the-art gunlance. Even if left in eternal rain, it'll never wear.

name: Amberift+

name: Striker's Gunlance I

name: Amber Pike Ne'erthaw
description: This gunlance pierces deep, spreading limitless iciness through its victims.

name: Striker's Gunlance II
description: A gunlance with desirable firing and blocking power. Reliable, sleek, and popular.

name: Imperial Guardlance

description: This upgraded version of the Striker's Gunlance values stability above all else.

description: An enhanced iron gunlance made even more deadly by a master smithy.

description: A gunlance enhanced by a master craftsman. Adaptable enough for anyone to wield.

name: Frostmoon Gunlance
description: This Lunagaron gunlance's frozen barrel scatters moonlit ice shards with every shot.

description: The bride pays heed to the black shadow. A cold grudge seeps in and twists her.

description: This weapon blazes a trail to a future free of hardship, until it takes on a carmine hue.

name: Mighty Soulsacker
description: At long last the souls of dispatched dragons quiet the vengeful Magnamalo.

description: The vengeful spirit of the Wyvern of Malice lives on in this gunlance.

name: Tyrannenarm+
description: A weapon said to destroy the very soul. The shield's eye wills prey to submit.

description: Souls harbored within turn to cleansing flame and fly free of this fierce gunlance.

name: Tyrannenarm
description: A weapon said to destroy the very soul. The shield's eye wills prey to submit.

description: A weapon said to gun down the very soul. The shield's giant gem bewitches prey.

name: La Forteresse
description: The jewel decorating this golden gunlance lures prey to a blissful end.

name: Great Demon Gunlance

name: Azure Elder Gunlance I

name: Demonlord Gunlance
description: A gunlance imbued with the ire of a Rajang. Its unforgiving thrusts feel like lightning strikes.

name: Azure Elder Gunlance II
description: The quiet, smoldering anger of Wind Serpent Ibushi embodied in a gunlance.

name: Abyssal Gale Gunlance
description: The fierce power of the Wind Serpent lives on in this tempestuous gunlance.

name: Skyrift Tempest
description: A fierce wind whips up into a surprise squall. Even gods are rocked by its ferocity.

name: Abyssal Storm Gunlance
description: This gunlance's sound evokes Narwa's thunderous howl. It could split the heavens.

name: Thunderbolt Gunlance I
description: The embodiment of Narwa's resentment. It strikes like lightning, hard and fast.

name: Bazel Buster I
description: Hits from this gunlance are accompanied by a flurry of explosive flames.

name: Skyrift Thunderstorm
description: A deep rumble breaks from the heavens. Even gods are rocked by its ferocity.

name: Bazel Buster II
description: Hits from this gunlance are accompanied by a flurry of explosive flames.

name: Bazel Destroyer
description: The flames that burst forth from this gunlance burn hot with passion and zeal.

description: The flames that burst forth from this gunlance burn hot with passion and zeal.

name: Icesteel Gunlance I

name: Daora's Brigia+
description: This upgraded gunlance freezes the battlefield in permanent winter.

name: Daora's Tempest
description: A blizzard cuts howling over the tundra, with a glowing heart of fire deep inside.

name: Daora's Brigia
description: This upgraded gunlance freezes the battlefield in permanent winter.

description: A Venomous Cologne upgrade. It can now utilize a more potent form of poison.

name: Redwing Gunlance I

name: Reddnaught Gunlance

name: Canyne Cannon I
description: A ferocious gunlance. Its bark and its bite are equally fierce in measure.

description: A ferocious gunlance. Its bark and its bite are equally fierce in measure.

name: Howlitzer
description: This gunlance will tear through prey like a fanged beast on the hunt.

name: Cornpopper I

name: Cornpopper II
description: A gunlance born from a corny dedication to farming. Looks aside, it's got good pop.

name: Mighty Cornpopper

description: The God of Grains pops the sweet Cornpopper to victory with a juicy new barrel!

name: Mighty Cornpopper+
description: The Cornpopper's upgraded form. Achieving a good harvest is all in the mind!

name: Sleepy Shellgun I
description: A gunlance designed by a fisherman. Its sea-breeze sound can invite sleep.

name: Soporific Shellgun
description: This upgraded seashell gunlance creates a powerful sleep-inducing effect.

description: A gunlance designed by a fisherman. Its sea-breeze sound can invite sleep.

name: Dreamsniper
description: Born of a legend among divers, this gunlance brings turbulence to the hunt.

name: Royal Order's Pledge+
description: A gunlance used by knights of the Order. Only those who've sworn to become stronger may wield it.

name: Antique Machina GL
description: Gunlance of emerald and gold furnished with a mechanism utilizing afflicted energy.
